name: Phil's School
description:
Your math teacher, Mr. Phil lost his class' homework assignments, and he needs you to get them back! However, Phil does not like bad grades AT ALL! If you mess up the homework, you are in deep trouble...

WASD to move, SPACE to interact, 1, 2, 3, 4 for items, Hold R to run, 0 for map, arrow keys to move camera.

What do the items do:

-Chocolate bars give stamina

-Soda gives 250 stamina or gets rid of all stamina

-Water bottles make spills on the floor

-Wet floor signs block off doors or halls

-Bananas add 50 stamina and give you a banana peel

-Banana peels can trip Phil

-(NOT YET ADDED) Radios attract the bully, the rude kid, and the student

-(NOT YET ADDED)  Walkie talkies attract the administrator

-(NOT YET ADDED) Clocks attract Phil
